entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Allow opening (raw) compressed archive entries in ZipArchiveEntry #63155
  • TcpClient.GetStream() sample code is incorrect and confusing #63154
  • Suspicious fragments found by PVS-Studio Static Analyzer #63149
  • Incorrect nullable annotation for ValidationAttribute.IsValid overload #63147
  • Infinite update of the settings file when opened from WSL2 #63145
  • Generated exe files don't work on arm64 #63144
  • Test failure Loader\\AssemblyDependencyResolver\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests.cmd #63143

Closed

  • CryptoStream.Read() read less bytes in .NET6 than in .NET5 #63151
  • RuntimeInformation.ProcessArchitecture is not a JIT constant #57152
    Future
  • Update Novell headers in System.Drawing.Common #63146
  • [API Proposal]: Change behaviour of Setting SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize (Or add documentation) #57859
    Future
  • Logging - inject custom fields into console logger (json) via DI #63068
    Future
  • [Android][x86][arm] System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.AllocateArrayTooLarge throws OverflowException instead of OutOfMemoryException #63079
    7.0.0
  • how to collect all assembly references. #63093

PullRequests

Created

  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Missing test files #63148
    area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Fixup some formatting in shared code #63156
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Move System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation to CoreLib #63140
    area-System.Runtime
  • NativeAOT: Do not run Vector version of Hardware Intrinsics when AVX2… #62951
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix a regression caused by 9ddd58a58d14a7bec5ed6eb777c6703c48a… #63084
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1527799 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch run` does not read `appsettings.Development.json` when `--project` is used #23183

Closed

  • Install .NET SDK 6.0.1 would not remove the previous 6.0.0 SDK #23115
  • bcbc1212 #23178

PullRequests

Created

  • Assume basline capabilities #23185
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Use project path instead of working directory to resolve launchSettings.json #23184
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • fixes dotnet/sdk#23162 dotnet new console --help doesn't work starting 6.0.2xx #23164
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
  • Open question for semi-auto properties #5563

PullRequests

Merged

  • Tweak readonly backing field wording #5583
  • Update semi auto props spec around readonly backing field for init-only #5582
  • Spec change around backing field being readonly #5575

Updated

  • Open questions for semi auto properties #5573

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there an API syntax node that allows developers to get error messages through error messages? #58503
  • Move static members to another type does not use the correct visibility #58502

Closed

  • Line-end errors overlap with the line content #58501
  • Suggestion: Lower specific calls to String.StartsWith to faster code #58504

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow valid metadata name characters in source generator hint names #58506
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix branch link in language feature status #58505
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community

Updated

  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Stack Trace Explorer improvements #58458
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Report level 7 name warning for `record` when langversion is below 9 #58452
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve error reporting for 'this()' initializer from 'record struct' constructor #58430
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ApiAuthorization VS Authentication: Null reference on missing configuration dependency #39206
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39204
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #39203
  • Blazor WASM "Error trying to log you in" on Net 5 and 6 in VS 2022 #39201
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware could allow custom code to decide whether to log or not #39200
  • Blazor PWA Not Able to Install After Publishing on Azure Web Service #39195

Closed

  • Error unprotecting the session cookie. #39091
  • Rename Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Internal.Transport package in razor-compiler repo #39072
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Hello @pcarret, thanks for contacting us. #39205
  • Using Custom ILogger with ErrorBoundary produces exception = null #39039
    7.0-preview1
  • (Blazor) Why is onchange event default for <input>? #39197
  • (Blazor) Default type for @typeparam #39191
  • ASP.NET web core API - incorrect default xml serialization in Swagger #39064
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor analyzer for non-existing property #39167
  • FindByIdAsync requires string instead of int even with ApplicationUser: IdentityUser<int> #39157
  • Webassembly / WASM Should Be its own TargetPlatform #37519
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: https #39187

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21626.1 #39207
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Include the exception when logging in WebAssemblyErrorBoundaryLogger #39202
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `97a4675` to `d81ae2f` #39196
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinUI] Fix Shell to work with ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar #3864
  • Backbutton is currently visible on WinUI without NavigationPage and doesn't display when using NavigationPage #3863

Closed

  • Port Editor.AutoSize to Handler #395

PullRequests

Created

  • GridLayout -> Grid to reduce confusion #3865
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲

Merged

  • Added Shell Page dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375

Updated

  • [iOS] Add AutoresizingMask to WindowOverlay GraphicsView #3804
  • Added appsettings.json in configurations #3446 #3844
    area/hosting 🧩
  • WinUI Flyout Handler #3735
    area/FlyoutPage, 6.0.200-preview.12
  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Listview handler via `Compatibility.ViewRenderer` #3817
    do-not-merge
  • Remove layout resolution #3818
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
